form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Devon Bank Letter of Account Maintenance

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/2/2023 6445 NORTH WESTERN AVENUE . CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 60645 . (312) 465-2500 DEVON BANK TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: This is to certify that Desai, Prabha or Desai, Suman who resides at 4719 W. Parker, Chicago, IL 60639 opened a checking Account at Devon Bank, Chicago, Illinois on 2-24-86 . This account has been maintained in a satisfactory manner from that date and currently carries a balance of $ 4,119.91 . Yours very truly, DEVON BANK STATE OF ILLINOIS COUNTY OF COOK Subscribed and sworn to before me this 14th day of December 19 88 . "OFFICIAL SEAL" " PETER WESLEY Card Notary Public NOTARY PUB OF ILLINOIS My Commission Expires 7/31/91
